name: The Extraordinary Life and Times of Nigel Farage, Gentleman
name_original: The Extraordinary Life and Times of Nigel Farage, Gentleman
description:
Experience the thrill of the far right through your very own fingertips.

Control the destiny of a nation through SIX action packed mini games.

Visit the pub. Visit the beer garden. Visit the constituents. Visit so much more.

A cut-and-paste-action-text-game-of-skill-and-virtue.

-----CONTROLS ----

Arrow keys (Movement etc.)

Z and X - Do Stuff

SHIFT - Speeds up movement (Sometimes)

F - Resize Screen
